trans-unit.source: Specifies the action that occurs when a workflow becomes idle when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a ação que ocorre quando um fluxo de trabalho fica ocioso quando a persistência é permitida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> function is invoked when the scheduler has no more pending work items and the workflow runtime can persist.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> função é invocada quando o Agendador tem não mais itens de trabalho pendente e o tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho pode persistir.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> function is invoked when persistence is not allowed, and both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> are invoked in that order when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> função é invocada quando a persistência não é permitida e ambos <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> e <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> são invocados nessa ordem quando a persistência é permitida.

trans-unit.source: None is the default action if no <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> handler is provided.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum é a ação padrão se nenhuma <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> manipulador é fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que nenhuma ação será tomada.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication" /> should persist the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication" /> deve persistir o fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication" /> should persist and unload the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication" /> deve persistir e descarregar o fluxo de trabalho.
